main event: An unusually bright object was observed in the sunset sky of Canaan, New Hampshire, on January 14, 1968.
interesting points: The object left a sharply defined, evenly bright trail., It was brighter than a welding arc., The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes., The sighting does not correlate with any military activity in the area., The object was unlike a meteor or any other known aerial phenomenon.
sighted object: an unusually bright object in the sky
